lines.text: Thunder and lightning. Enter three Witches

lines.speaker: first witch
lines.text: When shall we three meet again In thunder, lightning, or in rain?

lines.speaker: second witch
lines.text: When the hurlyburly's done, When the battle's lost and won.

lines.speaker: third witch
lines.text: That will be ere the set of sun.

lines.speaker: all
lines.text: Fair is foul, and foul is fair: Hover through the fog and filthy air.
